title: Hidilyn Diaz: From accusations of anti-government plot to historic Olympic gold
description: Hidilyn Diaz was accused of plotting against the Philippine government. Then she won her country's first Olympic gold.

title: UK to introduce Online Safety Bill
description: Under its rules, social networks could be fined or blocked if they fail to remove harmful content.

title: 'Relentless Liverpool throw down gauntlet in title race to Man City'
description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp's triple fist pump after Wednesday's 2-0 win at Arsenal could just as easily have been the sound of a gauntlet being thrown down in front of Manchester City.

title: Ros Atkins On... Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe and the Iran debt
description: Ros Atkins takes a look at the reasons why two British-Iranian nationals are freed after years in prison.

title: Ukraine conflict: Biden brands Putin a 'war criminal'
description: The off-the-cuff remark prompts Russia to call the comment "unforgiveable rhetoric".

title: War in Ukraine: Fourth Russian general killed - Zelensky
description: The news raises questions over why senior Russian officers are getting so close to the fighting.

title: Anoosheh Ashoori: Daughter and wife say they'll welcome him with cake and beer
description: Anoosheh Ashoori's wife and daughter spoke to the BBC as he flew home from an Iranian prison.

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe: Husband looks forward to 'new life'
description: Richard Ratcliffe said he was "deeply grateful" for his wife's release from Iran after nearly six years.

title: First pictures of earthquake hitting Japan
description: Cameras shake as a powerful tremor in north-east Japan strikes, cutting power to millions of people.

title: Kherson: Russian-occupied city stays angry and defiant
description: More than a fortnight after falling under Russian occupation, the residents of Kherson are wrestling with acute shortages while protesting against the Kremlin's forces.

title: Saudi Arabia: Boris Johnson to raise human rights in energy talks
description: Boris Johnson's visit aims to build a coalition against President Putin, and secure energy supplies.

title: Ukraine war: Zelensky invokes 9/11 in plea to US Congress
description: Ukraine's leader invoked the horror of the 2001 attacks on the US as he pleaded for more military aid.

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe and Anoosheh Ashoori on way home to UK
description: The British-Iranians had been held in Iran for years, but will be reunited with their families later.

title: Russia's state TV hit by stream of resignations
description: Marina Ovsyannikova's protest highlighted a growing number of journalists leaving their jobs at Kremlin-run TV channels.

title: Wayne Couzens: Met PCs deny sharing offensive messages with killer
description: PC Jonathon Cobban, PC William Neville and ex-officer Joel Borders will stand trial in July.

title: Bale and Ramsey in Wales squad for World Cup play-off against Austria
description: Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey are included in Wales' squad for their World Cup qualifying play-off semi-final against Austria.

title: Lighter started Paisley fire that killed three children
description: Investigators found that the blaze in Paisley in June 2020 began when bedding was set on fire.

title: War in Ukraine: Surrogate babies wait for parents in Kyiv bomb shelter
description: At least 21 infants born through surrogacy are left in limbo because of the war in Ukraine.

title: The Western brands unable to leave Russia
description: Marks and Spencer, Burger King, Marriott and Accor say they cannot shut outlets due to franchise deals.

title: Brittney Griner: How can a US basketball star just vanish?
description: Brittney Griner, widely considered the best female player of all time, has been detained in Russia.

title: Lancashire starlings form swirling whale-shaped murmuration
description: Thousands of starlings are captured in a mesmerising aerial display above a nature reserve.

title: Women's World Cup: England skittle India for 134 to boost World Cup hopes
description: England breathe life into their World Cup defence with a four-wicket hammering of India, with off-spinner Charlie Dean claiming 4-23.

title: England keep World Cup hopes alive with impressive victory over India
description: Rejuvenated England breathe life into their World Cup defence with a four-wicket hammering of India in Mount Maunganui.

title: Teddie Mitchell: Baby murderer's ex warned police he would kill
description: The ex-partner of Teddie Mitchell's killer says she "tried so hard to tell everybody what he was like".

title: Ukraine: The volunteers racing aid from the UK to the front line
description: Volunteers are racing medical supplies from the UK to the Ukrainian front line.

title: Royal Society of Chemistry report says racism 'pervasive'
description: Racism is "pervasive" in chemical sciences, according to an investigation by the Royal Society of Chemistry.

title: The neighbourhood leading a green energy revolution
description: A small area of Scotland is the home of a groundbreaking experiment to power homes with green hydrogen.

title: Stormzy tour review: Star praises fans who waited two years to see him
description: The star thanks fans who held onto tickets for two years as his Heavy Is The Head tour launches.

title: New Zealand border to reopen from next month, PM Ardern says
description: PM Jacinda Ardern says they are "ready to welcome the world back", beginning with Australians.

title: Newspaper headlines: Zelensky's 'Nato concession' as Putin 'turns to Plan C'
description: Ukraine's admission that it will never join Nato leads the papers as Russian bombardment intensifies.

title: Afghans turn to cryptocurrencies amid US sanctions
description: US sanctions, failing banks, and the drying up of foreign aid have left Afghanistan's economy in tatters.

title: Nigerian volunteer: 'Fighting in Ukraine is better than living here'
description: Hundreds of young men across Africa say they want to take up arms in Ukraine.

title: Ukraine: Putin will search for a way to save face
description: What might Putin want, to be able to come out of the war looking good in the eyes of Russia's majority?

title: Ukraine war: The women tracing missing relatives
description: A group of women work 24/7 to help find loved ones separated by the war in Ukraine.

title: The tragedy of Afghanistan's malnourished children
description: The country's very youngest are casualties of a hunger crisis.

title: Ukraine war: Two women in Kyiv tower blocks record their new life under siege
description: Two Ukrainian women have kept a video diary recording their new lives while under attack from Russia.
